regexCodeList.string: Thunder roars and a bolt of lightning strikes you, knocking you to the ground.
A cold wind blows chill grey clouds in from the north. The clouds circle around you, suddenly constricting into a tight band of compressed air that makes it hard to breathe.
You pass through a chill wind, which numbs you to the bone.
A chilling wind from the south sends an odd scent to your nostrils.
A cloudy tendril lashes at you, filling your mind with disturbing images.
The freezing blizzard nips at your fingers and toes.
A swift gust from the east pierces at your extremities, plunging through
^Thunder roars and a bolt of lightning strikes (\w+)\, knocking (?him|her|them) to the ground\.$
A swift gust from the east pierces at
^A swift gust from the east pierces at (\w+)\.$
^A freezing blizzard nips at (\w+)\.$
^A cloudy tendril lashes at (\w+)\.$
^A chilling wind from the south presses against (\w+)\.$
^From the north\, grey clouds swirl and tighten around (\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: Aeromancer Terrain
Trigger.script:
echo"
"echo"
"
echo"                      " mm.echof(matches[2] .. " condensated the room.")
echo"
"

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) takes a deep breath, then slowly breathes out, as the temperature in the room falls and banks of clouds roll in\.$
^(\w+) takes a deep breath, then slowly breathes out, as the temperature in the room falls and banks of clouds roll in, masking the (\w+) in a light frost\.$

Trigger.name: Aeromancer Meld
Trigger.script:
echo"
"echo"
"
echo"                      " mm.echof(matches[2] .. " MELDED the room.")
echo"
"

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) sweeps the air with (?:his|her|their) hand and (?:his|her|their) eyes glow with a phosphorescent blue\.$

Trigger.name: Cyclone 1 of 2

regexCodeList.string: From the four directions, winds blow in and gather, rotating slowly and gathering more momentum. The clouds begin to twist as they follow in their wake.

Trigger.name: Cyclone 2 of 2

regexCodeList.string: Picking up speed, the relentlessly churning winds become more powerful, and lightning begins to strike out from among the swirling clouds.
A cloud of jellyfish swarms around you, attacking you with tiny stings.
Violent rain slams into your skin so hard that they hit you like hot needles.
A biting cold seeps deep into your bones from the frigid water, making your teeth chatter.
An enormous wave sweeps over you, knocking you to the ground.
^(\w+) is drenched in a violent downpour of rain that leaves (?:his|her|their) skin raw\.$
^The frigid waters drain some of the colour from (\w+)'s skin\.$
^The frigid waters make (\w+)'s skin turn blue and (?:her|his) teeth begin to chatter\.$
^The frigid waters make (\w+)'s skin turn even bluer\.$
An enormous wave sweeps over
^An enormous wave sweeps over (\w+)\, knocking (?:him|her) to the ground\.$
^A cloud of jellyfish swarms around (\w+)\, attacking (?:him|her) with tiny stings\.$

Trigger.name: Aquamancer Terrain
Trigger.script:
echo"
"echo"
"
echo"                      " mm.echof(matches[2] .. " flooded the room.")
echo"
"

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) spins slowly around in a circle and water bubbles up from the ground, flooding the area\.$
^(\w+) spins slowly around in a circle, causing water to bubble and froth, becoming pure and clean\.$

Trigger.name: Aquamancer Meld
Trigger.script:
echo"
"echo"
"
echo"                      " mm.echof(matches[2] .. " MELDED the room.")
echo"
"

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) bends down and traces trails in the water with (?:her|his) fingers\. The waters sparkle with flecks of azure light\.$

Trigger.name: Maelstrom 1 of 2

regexCodeList.string: The sky glows with glowing sapphire clouds that release a powerful rain that pounds down upon you in heavy sheets.

Trigger.name: Maelstrom 2 of 2

regexCodeList.string: Towering waves roll across the waters, reaching to impossible heights and forming watery figures of monstrous sea creatures.
A deep, foreboding hum emanates from the tainted earth, and then you are suddenly slammed into the ground by an irresistable force.
Dust clouds rise as the earth shifts and sharp rocks slide and bounce, some flying into the air. You yelp in pain as several of them smash into you, bruising your flesh and cutting your skin.
Dust suddenly and painfully gusts into your eyes.
A deep, foreboding hum emanates from the tainted earth
^A deep\, foreboding hum emanates from the tainted earth\, and then (\w+) is suddenly slammed into the ground by an irresistable force\.$
^Dust clouds rise as the earth shifts and sharp rocks slide and bounce\, some flying into the air\. (\w+) yelps in pain as several of them smash into (?:him|her)\.$
^(\w+) coughs hoarsely as ugly cankerous sores break out on (?:his|her|their) skin\, dripping with pus\.$

Trigger.name: Geomancer Terrain
Trigger.script:
echo"
"echo"
"
echo"                      " mm.echof(matches[2] .. " tainted the room.")
echo"
"

regexCodeList.string: ^Slowly raising (?:her|his) arms above (?:her|his) head, (\w+) shouts a guttural phrase that causes the ground to rumble\. Tendrils of black smoke rise up from the earth and choke the life out of the surrounding foliage, which shrivels up and becomes brittle\.$

^Thick, oily smoke pours out of the mouth of (\w+) and creates an ankle-deep carpet of seething black fog\. As the smoke is soaked into the ground, the area turns putrid and foul\. This location is now tainted\.$

Trigger.name: Geomancer Meld
Trigger.script:
echo"
"echo"
"
echo"                      " mm.echof(matches[2] .. " MELDED the room.")
echo"
"

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) stomps on the ground and (?:his|her|their) eyes shine with an eerie red glow\.$

Trigger.name: Pollute 1 of 2

regexCodeList.string: Small fissures open up in the tainted earth, releasing toxic fumes that blacken the ground and pollute the air.

Trigger.name: Pollute 2 of 2

regexCodeList.string: With a great rumble, the small fissures on the ground widen to large cracks, sending great gouts of poisonous clouds roiling and churning into the air, making breathing difficult and your eyes water painfully.
Thick black smoke wreaths you, and you begin to hack and cough.
A rolling wave of fire sweeps over you.
Your skin and lips crack amid this parching heatwave.
Your flesh burns as a sheet of shimmering fire envelops you.
A burning salamander spits on your skin.
You are swarmed by several burning salamanders, and your mind reels momentarily.
A burning salamander breathes a cloud of superheated air into your face.
Liquid fire rains down on you, broiling your flesh.
A painful, searing rain of fire slams into you.
You begin to sweat profusely in this sweltering heat.
You breathe in some black ashes and then begin coughing hoarsely.
^Thick black smoke wreaths (\w+)\, and (?:he|she) begins to hack and cough\.$
A rolling wave of fire sweeps over
^A rolling wave of fire sweeps over (\w+)\.$
^(\w+)'s skin and lips crack amid the heatwave\.$
^(\w+) is swarmed by several burning salamanders\, and (?:she|he) blinks in surprise\.$
^A burning salamander spits in the skin of (\w+)\.$
^A burning salamander breathes a cloud of yellow air into the face of (\w+)\.$
^Liquid fire rains down on (\w+)\, broiling (?:|his|her|their) flesh\.$
^A searing rain of fire slams into (\w+)\, knocking (?:him|her|them) downward\.$
^(\w+) begins to sweat profusely in this sweltering heat\.$
^(\w+) breathes in some black ashes and then begins coughing hoarsely\.$
^(\w+)'s flesh turns red as a sheet of shimmering fire envelops (?:him|her)\.$
^(\w+)'s flesh begins to blister as a sheet of shimmering fire envelops (?:him|her)\.$
^(\w+)'s flesh turns black and charred as a sheet of shimmering fire envelops (?:him|her)\.$
^(\w+)'s muscles begin to burn and crack as a sheet of shimmering fire envelops (?:him|her)\.$

Trigger.name: Pyromancer Terrain
Trigger.script:
echo"
"echo"
"
echo"                      " mm.echof(matches[2] .. " burned the room.")
echo"
"

regexCodeList.string: ^After rubbing (?:his|her|their) hands together, (\w+) pulls them apart and releases thousands of glowing red sparks that whirl around (?:him|her|them) in a chaotic dance before flaring into small flames that spread out across the expanse of the location\.$

^After rubbing (?:his|her|their) hands together, (\w+) pulls them apart and releases thousands of glowing red sparks that whirl around (?:him|her|them) in a chaotic dance before flaring into small flames that spread out across the expanse of the location, burning away the (\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: Pyromancer Meld
Trigger.script:
echo"
"echo"
"
echo"                      " mm.echof(matches[2] .. " MELDED the room.")
echo"
"

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) claps (?:her|his) hands and (?:her|his) head is momentarily wreathed with a crown of flames\.$

Trigger.name: Inferno 1 of 2

regexCodeList.string: Small bonfires suddenly burst into existence here, surrounded by circles of dancing flames.

Trigger.name: Inferno 2 of 2

regexCodeList.string: Dancing flames jump into the small bonfires here, which suddenly explode into enormous pyres of incandescent fire which radiate waves of intense heat.
The tiny red mushrooms on the ground release a cloud of yellow spores, which travel up your nose and make your eyes water.
Small motes of yellow pollen rise up from the wildflowers around you and drift into your mouth. Your throat begins to scratch, forcing you to cough.
A vine drops down from a tree limb and lashes about your neck, choking you as it cuts deeply into your flesh with its tiny thorns.
Flying insects suddenly swarm you, covering you with tiny, painful stings.
A bolt of whitest lightning streaks down from the heavens and engulfs you. You writhe and shake in noiseless agony as the pure electricity ripples over your body.
Squirrels chitter madly but remain unseen in the trees. You are pelted by acorns that leave welts and bruises.
A murder of crows descends from the sky with black wings spread and eyes glowing a malevolent red, diving at you in a filthy flurry of malevolent talons and beaks.
Hundreds of bloated spiders crawl up your legs, their painful stings raising red welts on your skin.
A murder of crows descends from the sky with black wings spread and eyes glowing a malevolent red
^A murder of crows descends from the sky with black wings spread and eyes glowing a malevolent red\, diving at (\w+) in a filthy flurry of malevolent talons and beaks\.$
Hundreds of bloated spiders crawl up
^Hundreds of bloated spiders crawl up the legs of (\w+)\, their stings raising red welts on (?:his|her|their) skin\.$
Squirrels chitter madly but remain unseen in the
^Squirrels chitter madly but remain unseen in the trees\. (\w+) is pelted by acorns that leave welts and bruises\.$
A vine drops down from a tree limb and lashes about
^A vine drops down from a tree limb and lashes about (\w+)'s neck\, choking (?:him|her) as it cuts deeply with its tiny thorns\.$
The tiny red mushrooms on the ground release a cloud of yellow spores
^The tiny red mushrooms on the ground release a cloud of yellow spores\, which travel up (\w+)'s nose and make (?:his|her|their) eyes water\.$
Small motes of yellow pollen rise up from
^Small motes of yellow pollen rise up from the wildflowers and drift into (\w+)'s mouth\. (?:She|He) flushes and begins to cough\.$
Animated branches from the trees above suddenly reach down and clutch
^Animated branches from the trees above suddenly reach down and clutch (\w+) around the waist\, pulling (?him|her|them) into their foliage\.$
Flying insects suddenly swarm
^Flying insects suddenly swarm (\w+)\, covering (?:him|her) with tiny\, painful stings\.$
A bolt of lighting streaks down from the heavens and strikes
^A bolt of lighting streaks down from the heavens and strikes (\w+)\, who writhes terribly as the energy ripples over (?:him|her)\.$

Trigger.name: Hartstone Terrain
Trigger.script:
echo"
"echo"
"
echo"                      " mm.echof(matches[2] .. " forested the room.")
echo"
"

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) raises (?:his|her|their) arms and hums deeply the note of the forest\. The air sharpens and ethereal trees rise up from the ground, superimposing a translucent forest that shimmers with vitality\.$
^(\w+) raises (?:his|her|their) arms and hums deeply the note of the forest\. Around you, the wyrd seeps out of the trees and plant life, which start to look greener and healthier than before\.$

Trigger.name: Hartstone Meld
Trigger.script:
echo"
"echo"
"
echo"                      " mm.echof(matches[2] .. " MELDED the room.")
echo"
"

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) kneels down and touches (?:her|his) forehead to the earth, then whispers softly\. A deep emerald glow ripples across the ground and (\w+)'s eyes momentarily flash with a matching emerald light\.$

Trigger.name: Blacktalon Terrain
Trigger.script:
echo"
"echo"
"
echo"                      " mm.echof(matches[2] .. " wyrded the room.")
echo"
"

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) raises (?:her|his) arms and hums deeply the note of the forest, which breaks into a discordant tone\. Around you, the trees and plant life surge, looking darker and more forbidding than ever before\.$

^(\w+) raises (?:her|his) arms and hums deeply the note of the forest, which breaks into a discordant tone\. Silhouettes of twisted trees darken in the air, their long shadows casting a forbidding doom across the ground\.$

Trigger.name: Blacktalon Meld
Trigger.script:
echo"
"echo"
"
echo"                      " mm.echof(matches[2] .. " MELDED the room.")
echo"
"

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) crouches low and looses a terrifying, raucous cry that echoes through the air, the shadows writhing and whispering with a seething, malevolent will\. A horrific mauve light twists across the ground, the plant-life shuddering violently in response\.$

Trigger.name: Fury 1 of 2

regexCodeList.string: Deep within the ground, an ominous rumbling shakes the earth and the trees begin to sway.

Trigger.name: Fury 2 of 2

regexCodeList.string: A shrieking wind rushes through the trees, sending forest debris and small rocks up into the air. Animals howl around you and the sky darkens overhead.
return isPrompt()

Trigger.name: Wildewood Glinshari

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) goes rigid and still before a quiver climbs up (?:his|her|their) behemoth form, causing (?:his|her|their) roots and branches to quiver as a thrill rushes through (?:his|her|them)\. Every blossom upon (?:his|her|their) branches spread their petals wide, releasing their pollen in a multicoloured cloud that twists about (?:him|her|them), throbbing and churning as it grows in size\.$

Trigger.name: Aquachemantics Aquoxitism

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) exhales a long, slow breath into (?:his|her|their) mists, willing many of them together\. A swirling mass of mists churns together, expanding outwards in a chilly fog\.$

Trigger.name: Trueground Terrain
Trigger.script:
echo"
"echo"
"
echo"                      " mm.echof(matches[2] .. " truegrounded the room.")
echo"
"

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) closes (?:his|her|their) eyes and bows (?:his|her|their) head\. There is a small shudder around you, and the (.*) environment melts away, revealing itself as truly (\w+)\.$
^Taking a deep breath\, (\w+) closes (?:his|her|their) eyes and bows (?:his|her|their) head\. There is a small shudder around you\, and you feel the atmosphere here suddenly lighten\.$

ScriptGroup.name: m&m Demense Compress
ScriptGroup.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- module("dtc",package.seeall)
local d = {names = {}, type = false} function hit(name, type) -- if it's druid and we know the type already, don't overwrite it if type == "Druid" and not d.type then d.type = "Druid" -- otherwise, remember the type elseif type ~= "Druid" then d.type = type end
-- add the names to the list of victims... if not table.contains(d.names, name) then d.names[#d.names+1] = name end
-- gag this line... deleteLine() -- and enable the prompt trigger so it processes this info on the next prompt enableTrigger("DTC prompt") end
function prompt() echo"
"echo"
"echo"
" local s = string.format("%s demesne tic hit %s.", d.type, table.concat(d.names, ", ")) if mm then mm.echof(s) else echo(s) end
raiseEvent("demesne tic hit", d.type) -- reset the list for next time d = {names = {}, type = false} -- and disable ourselves echo"
"echo"
"echo"
" disableTrigger("DTC prompt") end
